ABOUT.LINE2: My name is Ismet Meray and I am 22 years young. At the moment I major in Computer Science at Avans university of applied sciences located in Den Bosch, The Netherlands. Currently my interests are in developing mobile apps or web-applications. besides developing software I also enjoy unleashing my creativity by producing or mixing music, designing and poking tattoos and of course spending time with friends and family

PROJECT.TITLE: Latest Projects
PROJECT.PHASE1: Phase 1(current phase): Keeping track of and seeing your progress of different exercises
PROJECT.PHASE2: Phase 2: Mindfullness training with different exercises
PROJECT.PHASE3: Phase 3: Keeping track of calories and macronutrients

PROJECT1.DESC1: a SchoolProject where an app has been developed to give a coach the opportunity to offer coaching for an athlete.
PROJECT1.DESC2: This coaching is done by adding annotations or sound recordings to a video of the exercise sent by the athlete.
PROJECT1.DESC3: The athlete also follows a trajectory e.g. condition or strength where new exercises are unlocked as soon as the coach has approved the last exercise that has been completed by the athlete

PROJECT2.DESC1: MyDenitity is a product provided by Epesi B.V. it supports hairdressers giving their customers a better experience, by using a mobile app and sesor which then gives the hairdresser information about the employee that has just entered the building
PROJECT2.DESC2: My job there as an intern was to work on the analytical side of the project, A place where the owner can observed graphs containing different types of data e.g. total customer visits per day, month or year, male or female? etc.
